r's comment on this on [golang-nuts](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!searchin/golang-nuts/embedded$20struct$20josh/golang-nuts/LUF4LpXVU8g/ckiPyQXzFZcJ) was:

> It might one day, but as it stands the requirement to provide more information is more robust against changes in the data types.
